products.name: Dayton Audio HTA100 Stereo Tube Amplifier
products.description: Experience warm, rich sound with the Dayton Audio HTA100 stereo tube amplifier. Perfect for audiophiles seeking vintage audio quality.

products.name: Cambridge Audio CXA81 Integrated Amplifier
products.description: The CXA81 combines 80 watts per channel with an ESS Sabre DAC for exceptional clarity. Bluetooth aptX HD connectivity and premium build quality.

products.name: Yamaha A-S801 Stereo Amplifier
products.description: Yamaha's A-S801 features their legendary ToP-ART design with USB DAC functionality. Pure Direct mode bypasses tone controls for purist listening.

products.description: The PMA-1700NE represents Denon's commitment to high-fidelity audio. Advanced AL32 Processing and Ultra High Current power amplifier deliver stunning dynamics.
